paper_abstract: In this paper, the problem of stabilization for the class of continuous time nonlinear systems which ale discretized in closed form is addressed. By using the Takagi-Sugeno model approach. a discrete controller capable of stabilizing the discrete Takagi-Sugeno model and the continuous model as well. is obtained This scheme allows using a digital controller for stabilizing an analog plant. paper_title: Stabilization for a class of nonlinear systems: A fuzzy logic approach
